attributes.action: Make it compulsory for British football clubs to have 51% ownership by fans.
attributes.background: In light of the intended European Super League and the damage that will be done the British government needs to look after our football clubs as part of our national heritage. To do this we should adopt a model similar to Germany which gives fans real control and say in their clubs

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/583310
